title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: Sweden is planning to invite North Korea and the U.S. to hold another round of negotiations in Stockholm where earlier this month it hosted a round of working-level talks.Meeting with reporters here in Seoul today, Sweden's Special Envoy to the Korean Peninsula, Kent Rolf Magnus Harstedt, said the timing and the location will be determined based on what both Pyeongyang and Washington can agree to.He was also optimistic about the future of such talks, saying both parties know this is a historic and realistic opportunity.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
